mainText:
I saw him briefly at Apple HQ cafeteria in Cupertino this summer while
standing in line waiting to order sushi. I turned around and he was standing
right next to me looking me in the face. I was a star struck bright eyed kid
lost in a trance unable to look away, smiling ear to ear.

Steve was my idol and my great mentor.

Thank you.

RIP
author: Kirill
